title: Love Across Continents
description: A heartfelt song celebrating love that transcends distance and borders.
lyrics:
When you smiled, the world began to move in time,
My heart learned the rhythm of your laughter,
And love danced into my life without warning.

We found love beneath a sky of quiet stars,
No storybook, just truth in your eyes,
And suddenly, the world felt whole again.

One world, one heart — beating in tune,
Across every ocean, I’m drawn to you.
Different lands, but love’s the same,
One fire, one song, one name.

Every sunrise paints your name in light,
The world turns gentle when you smile,
You are the calm that love becomes.

Your flaws are verses I hold close,
Your touch — the place time fades to still,
Kiss me once, and forever begins again.

One world, one heart — beating in tune,
Across every ocean, I’m drawn to you.
Different lands, but love’s the same,
One fire, one song, one name.

From every shore, beneath one sky,
Love speaks in tones that never die.
No borders, no lines, just hearts in rhyme —
One world, one heart, one time.
